Name: Momo Special
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Soda Water
Instructions: Lightly MUDDLE mint (just to bruise) in base of shaker. Add next 3 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda, lightly stir and serve with straws.
Review: Enrich the minty flavour by macerating the mint in the vodka some hours before making.
History: Created in 1998 by Simon Mainoo at Momo, London, England.
